TopicTitle: I was inspired to make some WWI propaganda after seeing "Kerbals At war"

Articles.Content:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R_KqZNoE3nY


Believe it or not, the Biplane was the part of this video that took so long. Thanks for watching!

Thumbs up from me! Although you could have sped up the biplane's flight a little or cut out some of it to make it a little faster-paced, it's nice and well-done! I especially like the grainy effect you added, that was the final touch that made it great.

Thanks, I guess I could have made it faster, It was a slow plane I had to keep under 1/3 throttle and press W every once in a while just to keep control of it, it was such a jittery craft! Most likely won't ever use it again until I make some major improvements. It took off at 30 m/s and is almost impossible to land!

Edited August 13, 2013 by Yuri Kargarin
More biplane info

LOL! That's great!

All that was missing is that announcers voice over.

LOL! That's great!

All that was missing is that announcers voice over.

I thought about that, but I don't have a good mic yet. =/ My next video will probably be WWII related, but that's all I'm telling:sticktongue:

Edited August 13, 2013 by Yuri Kargarin
Thanks to everyone that has watched the video, and thank you all for your support!
